entry.data:
SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 90
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 90
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING NORTH IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
HOT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 90S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
LOWS IN THE MID 70S

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
